full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Power Distribution Units (PDUs)
#### Solicitation Number: BPM017561/21011
#### Publication Date: January 2, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: December 19, 2022 @ 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking quotations for 12 Power Distribution Units (PDUs) to support its operational requirements.

**Key Information:**

- **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
- **Location:** The contract will be performed in Ontario, Canada, with the exception of the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Submission Instructions:**

- **Bid Deadline:** December 19, 2022, @ 2:00 PM EST
- **Bidder Inquiries:** Suppliers may submit emails to raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
- **Access to Solicitation:** The solicitation is available on the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Procurement and Tendering (P2P) Portal at: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public

**Description:**
SSC requires 12 Power Distribution Units (PDUs) to support its operational needs. Suppliers are required to submit a quotation outlining their proposed solutions.

**Contact Information:**

- **Name:** Raiyane Benchekroun
- **Email:** raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 613 324 4061
- **Fax:** (613) 960-6007
- **Address:** Raiyane Benchekroun, 180 rue Kent St, 13 Floor, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8, CANADA

1.  Government procurement process
2.  Information technology and procurement
3.  Sharing
